forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the atmosphere feels tempered by the embrace of low-hanging clouds, lending an almost reflective quality to the scenery. The forecast speaks of a high around 56, softening to about 54 in the afternoon—a gentle reminder that warmth is often a fleeting visitor here. A light south-southwest breeze, no more than a whisper at 2 to 6 mph, may accompany you as you navigate these urban streets. The marine layer stretches over the horizon, hinting at the presence of fog delicately draping itself along the edges of the Golden Gate and resting over the bay, softening the outlines of the cityscape.

Come evening, temperatures will dip around 48, urging one to layer thoughtfully—perhaps a light jacket over a cozy sweater will serve well against the lingering coolness. This may not be a day that calls for grand outdoor adventures, but a quiet stroll through the streets, a visit to a charming café, or perhaps taking in the sights of a local art gallery can offer solace and moments of reflection. As the waning light gives way to evening's shadowy embrace, consider the pleasures of a bookshop, where you can order a warm drink and lose yourself for a while amidst the pages, watched over by the city that never truly sleeps.
